definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: May be required to take written and trade test.
sentences.chinese: 面试者或须接受测试及笔试。

sentences.english: After the exam, all the lessons in school also came to an end.
sentences.chinese: 公务员考试笔试后，学校的课程也都结束了。

sentences.english: The IELTS also has a speaking section, unlike the paper version of the TOEFL.
sentences.chinese: 雅思还有一个口语部分，与托福的全部笔试截然不同。

sentences.english: Five others have multiple-choice written exams, but they are not very hard.
sentences.chinese: 其他五个州设置了多选题的笔试，但并不非常困难。

sentences.english: After a series of tests and interviews, Wang was offered a job at the civil service.
sentences.chinese: 通过一系列的笔试和面试，王烁成为了一名公务员。

sentences.english: A written final examination (without the use of the textbook) will be given at the end of the term.
I think I did well in the paper exams.
sentences.chinese: 我想在笔试的时候我答得很好。

sentences.english: They also must pass a written examination to be certified as a Registered Health Information Technician (RHIT).
sentences.chinese: 他们还必须通过卫生注册信息技术员的笔试。

sentences.english: Later, she switched to the normal test.
sentences.chinese: 之后，她转成了普通的笔试考试。

sentences.english: They may also post advice on how to prepare for written tests and job interviews.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们还会就如何准备笔试和面试给出一些建议。

sentences.english: Howerver, I believe I was a losser for the last step of test of written English.
sentences.chinese: 最后一个步骤是英语笔试，总共有三道题目。

sentences.english: We have three mock exams before the final written examination.
sentences.chinese: 在最终笔试前，我们有三次模拟考试。

sentences.english: Scarcely can be credulous those results that had included about written examination, want to rely on oneself.
sentences.chinese: 一定不能轻信那些关于笔试包过的答案，要靠自己。

sentences.english: You will need to take 300 hours of classes and pass both written and practical exams.
sentences.chinese: 你需要上300小时的课并且通过笔试和实践考试。

sentences.english: Notes : (1) Computer written test are available at Kowloon and N. T. Region.
sentences.chinese: 电脑笔试只在九龍及新界区举行。

sentences.english: Notes : (1) Computer written test are available at Kowloon and N. T. Region only.
sentences.chinese: 电脑笔试只在九龍及新界区举行。

definition: to add material to an exam/supplementary exam
to advertise an entrance examination for an academic institution (old)
exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
to sit for the second round of a two-stage exam
to give a detailed exposition/to state in detail
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to enter oneself for an examination
